system.description:
WHEN YOUR PO-2 IS HIT BY BULLETS OR FLAK roll +luck. On a 10+ the old girl’s in one piece and you are fine. On a 7-9 she holds together and you choose two consequences:

  • You and your fellow airwoman are marked
  • Casualties on board (Split 5 harm between you however you like; also triggers Wheels Down later)
  • Your plane is damaged (Also triggers Wheels Down later)
  • Another plane in your section goes down (GM will decide which)

On a miss the GM might choose three from the 7-9 list or maybe something more horrific.
